example: The toddler wobbled and lost his balance (= started to fall sideways).
I had to borrow a pen from the invigilator to do the exam.
He moved slowly and cautiously along the dark rocky path.

meaning: lấy đi, trừ đi, khấu trừ
example: The player had points deducted (from his score) for arguing with the referee.
Dividends will be sent to shareholders.

meaning: phần tiền trả trước ban đầu
example: I made/put a down payment on a new smart TV.

meaning: (n) sự cầm cố, sự thế chấp, (v) cấm cố, thế chấp
example: They took out a £40o,000 mortgage (= they borrowed £40o,000) to buy the house.

meaning: bị hạn chế, bị giới hạn
example: Building in this area of town is restricted.
They had to take out two of his teeth.
